headline: INVESTIGATION ALERT: Berger Montague PC Investigates Aflac, Inc.'s Board Of Directors For Breach of Fiduciary Duties (NYSE
summary: PHILADELPHIA, July 8, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Berger Montague is investigating potential breaches of fiduciary duty and corporate governance failures at Aflac Inc. related to the Company's recent...
